mapper.select: SELECT sidoCd AS sidoCd, sidoCdNm AS sidoCdNm, sgguCd AS sgguCd, sgguCdNm AS sgguCdNm FROM GUGUN WHERE sidoCd = #{sidoCd}
SELECT sidoCd AS sidoCd, sidoCdNm AS sidoCdNm, sgguCd AS sgguCd, sgguCdNm AS sgguCdNm, emdongNm AS emdongNm FROM DONG WHERE sgguCd=#{sgguCd}
SELECT HOSP_NO AS hosp_no, yadmNm, telno FROM DOC_HOSP WHERE sidoCd=#{sidoCd} and sgguCd=#{sgguCd} and emdongNm=#{emdongNm}
